children.title: A Space for Co-Creation, Collaboration, and Community
children.description: I'm an entrepreneur passionate about building high-impact tech solutions to benefit the global community. My greatest joy is in empowering talented and goal-oriented teams to deliver extraordinary results in a short amount of time. Spending the past decade between Toronto, Vancouver, and Singapore; I've had the opportunity to learn from great thinkers and doers spanning numerous disciplines.

children.title: Host a GatsbyJS Blog (with Notion as a CMS) for $0 with Netlify
children.description: However, just publishing my notion homepage publically was not the most optimal solution in my view, so I embarked on a journey to examine exactly what could be done with this flexible tool. After a weekend of tinkering, and help from various community resources, I've found 2 ways to host your own website, with Notion as a CMS, for the low, low price of $0 / month.
